Literature.Author: Li C, Zhou Z, Wang W, Zhao Y, Yin X, Meng Y, Zhao P, Wang M, Liu X, Wang X, Wang S, Ren B, Zhang L, Xia X. 2024
Literature.Title: Development of Antibacterial Peptides with Membrane Disruption and Folate Pathway Inhibitory Activities against Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (62.5%) toCGS11R: 44%, V:25%.Activity: Active against S. aureus MRSA (MIC 24 uM).Toxicity: murine RBC: HC50 >320 uM (poorly hemo.lytic). HC10 >3201 uM. Not toxic to HEK293 cells (IC50 > 320 uM).Structure: it became helical in 50% TFE.
